title.narrative: Protecting and Promoting Women's Rights and their Social and Economic Empowerment

description.narrative: Activities and networks on the district level contribute to assistance for older persons (older women)
Living conditions of older persons particularly older women have improved by initiatives on the national level in cultural, political and legislative terms.
Older women are better protected, they are respected in their dignity and they are less dependent economically
To promote older women's economic and social empowerment through combined initiatives of the government, media, CSOs, older men and women and wider communities.
